chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
modify the delivery address, deliver to a pickup point
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Please provide us with the updated relay address in the following format:
NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has already been shipped. Does the customer still want a change of delivery address? Please provide us with the updated relay address in the following format:
NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has already been shipped. Does the customer still want a change of delivery address? Please provide us with the updated relay address in the following format:
NAME
ADDRESS

TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY

Regards,

Dear Backcare,

The device has been delivered to the customer according to the tracking link provided. If the customer does not require any further assistance, please close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
